attributes.action: order all MP’s expenses over the last 10 years to be independently investigated, criminal charges to the full extent of UK law are brought to all whom have stolen funds from the public purse.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: MPs should not be allowed to seen as above the law. every MP who has stolen from the public purse to face the law of the land. repayment should not be an option. The law does not allow for ANY criminal to repay the victim after detection to evade conviction and punishment.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
